==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name may be a reference to the {{w|Jean-André_Lepaute|Lepaute}} brothers, 18th century French clockmakers.
** This can be also seen as Caron and [[Livre]] are clockmaker brothers.
* Horlogerie is the French word for clockmaking (or watchmaking), or a clockmaker's shop.
